SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRMirrorTextureDesc

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRMirrorTextureDesc
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class OVRMirrorTextureDesc extends Struct implements NativeResource
Description used to create a mirror texture.

Layout


 struct ovrMirrorTextureDesc {
     ovrTextureFormat Format();
     int Width;
     int Height;
     unsigned int MiscFlags();
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • OVRMirrorTextureDesc

      public OVRMirrorTextureDesc(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a OVRMirrorTextureDesc instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.

    • MiscFlags

      public int MiscFlags()
      ovrTextureFlags. One or more of:
      TextureMisc_NoneTextureMisc_DX_TypelessTextureMisc_AllowGenerateMips
      TextureMisc_ProtectedContentTextureMisc_AutoGenerateMips
